targets.query: SELECT max("99_percentile") AS "Max p99", max("90_percentile") AS "Max p90", max("50_percentile") AS "Max p50" FROM "tailor_ssai_respone_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

alert.message: [Master Shard] High Java Pod CPU usage
alert.name: % CPU Usage alert

targets.expr:
sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container="ssai-tailor", namespace=~"playback", pod=~"ssai-tailor-master-[^-]+-[^-]+" , }[1m])) by (pod)*100/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{container="ssai-tailor", namespace=~"playback", pod=~"ssai-tailor-master-[^-]+-[^-]+",  }) by (pod)

targets.query: SELECT max("99_percentile") AS "Max p99", max("90_percentile") AS "Max p90", max("50_percentile") AS "Max p50" FROM "tailor_ssai_respone_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
